bug.short_desc: mochitest-browser-chrome: fix browser_library_infoBox.js to check the intended elements

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
Bug 647877 comment 2: { neil@parkwaycc.co.uk 2011-04-06 02:21:23 PDT
The first change fixes the "bug" that the test was testing the behaviour that bug 646210 changed. (Firefox doesn't want that change, of course.)
The second change fixes the bug that the test was testing the behaviour of the same bookmark item over and over again, since the focus never moved to the bookmark item that it was actually trying to test. }
1- Fwiw, you can check (again) whether FF would want bug 646210 changed behavior.
2a- This bug is at least to investigate porting the second test fix.
Bug 647877 comment 3: { Serge Gautherie (:sgautherie) 2011-04-06 05:19:50 PDT
this test doesn't report anything about which actual node is being tested }
2b- It would help to report (for example) "values" of (some) tested items, so human testers could figure out whether this test works as intended or not...
As it is I don't understand much of this report, can I have a sum up without reading hundreds other bugs please?
